prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Pipe, Brass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Guitar, Pipe, and Brass, but Piano is absent.
